UK election results

The Conservatives secure a majority in a stunning victory

The election was a triumph for the Scottish nationalists, who gained dozens of seats, and a disappointment for Labour. The Liberal Democrats were crushed in seats across the country.

Number of seats won

Con
331
Lab
232
SNP
56
LD
8
DUP
8
PC
3

3
Grn
